---
title: "Requirements"
---

To start this lab, you'll need the following environments:

- **SQL**: MySQL, MySQL Workbench and a database called `db_data`
- **Python**: Anaconda, Anaconda Environment `prompt` and Visual Studio Code
- **Working environment**: A folder on your machine called *prompt* and an environment file with your OpenAI-API


:::{.callout-important}
Visit the "[Programming Toolkit-webpage](https://kirenz.github.io/lab-toolkit/)" to learn how to set up the environments.
:::
